title: Pancetta-wrapped Brussel Sprouts With Almonds
summary: The recipe Pancetta-wrapped Brussel Sprouts With Almonds is ready in approximately 6 minutes and is definitely a great gluten free and primal option for lovers of Mediterranean food. This recipe makes 2 servings with 478 calories, 15g of protein, and 38g of fat each. For $2.79 per serving, this recipe covers 32% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 3 people have made this recipe and would make it again. A mixture of almonds, butter, sage honey, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so scrumptious. With a spoonacular score of 86%, this dish is outstanding. Similar recipes are Brussel Sprouts with Pancetta, Roasted Brussel Sprouts with Garlic and Pancetta, and Braised Brussel Sprouts with Pancetta & Balsamic.

winePairing.pairingText: Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio are great choices for Italian. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. The Rodano Vigna Viacosta Chianti Classico with a 4.4 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 30 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Rodano Vigna Viacosta Chianti Classico
productMatches.description: Deep concentration of Sangiovese flavors of classic cherry, earth and a hint of smoky pistachio nuts. Made with 100% Sangiovese.
